overview:
From October 2008 to August 2011, Kevin Strawbridge was the President of DealTaker.com based in Dallas, Texas and experienced in marketing and e-commerce.

He has over fifteen years of direct marketing experience in senior roles for internet e-commerce, catalog, and multi-channel retail. He has been responsible for generating $10â€™s of millions in annual revenue through on-line and off-line marketing programs most notably with consumer, business and e-commerce branding for JCPenney Direct and jcpenney.com. He has proven abilities to create, manage and optimize profitable acquisition and retention of customers using direct response, telemarketing and loyalty programs using extensive experience targeting customers with relevant online and offline marketing programs. In addition, he has Four years of Big 4 accounting and consulting experience and three years of internet and small business start-up experience along with a Master of Science degree from Texas A&M University.
